caption.title: Reassortment of HA and NA in human influenza A/H3N2 from 2000 to 2015.
caption.p: The 95 inferred events are mapped on a joint HA-NA tree. The reassortant strain r of each event is represented by a filled circle (color-coded by year of occurrence). The events are homogeneously distributed over the tree and the reassortant clades are predominantly at peripheral positions of the tree.
